item.title: Shiny for Teaching
item.description: My two cents is that Shiny should be taught to those being introduced to R. I wrote a script one weekend to process/clean a data set. The script worked but I was unsettled that I was going to have copy this script for another data set. The reason I was unsetteled was because my script was dependent on the data frame I was working on but it did not have to be until the final result.
